body_html:
Maybe I have some fundamentally wrong assumptions about how memory registration works in verbs, but shouldn't the IB driver pin the memory pages in kernel space, as verbs user space library will send a command in ibv_cmd_reg_mr?

The user space library is not supposed to pin the user pages in user space API, like mlock(2).
